Posts.Content: My husband had a benign tumour on his piturity gland Dr.Â  called it Acromegaly it was removed 21 years ago. He has had had no after effects, and is checked every 2 years. No problem since removal. Good luck hope all goes well for you.
Posts.Title: Prolactin/Pituitary tumour

Posts.Content: Hi Like you I am about to go wig shopping and wondered if anyone can recommend anywhere in Newcastle upon Tyne please.
Posts.Title: WIG shopping

Posts.Content: I had lumpectomy and removal of lymph nodes on 21st Feb, have completed all exercises as given by physio and have a full range of movement thankfully, It is still rather sore as I would expect after only 7 days, I feel my main problem is when I bend forward, and gravity takes over, it feels bloody awful, I now find before I bend I hold onto my boob. I was unsure what to wear post surgery bra or crop top, opted for bra as I thought it would give more support.
Posts.Title: Arm movement, tightness and pain following mastectomy, axillary clearance...
